item.title: Visual Analytics Project
item.dc:creator: Amos Lau
Cheryl Pay
Louis Chong
item.description: This post provides an overview of our project VISTAS (Visualising Industry Skill TAlent Shifts) as well as links to the application, proposal, poster, research paper and Github repository.

item.title: Visual Analytics Assignment - Visualising Country, Skill and Industry Migration
item.dc:creator: Amos Lau
item.description: This report is part of a group project for our visual analytics module. Our project is titled VISTAS - Visualising Industry Skill TAlent Shifts. Each group member is tasked with completing a sub-module of the final group project.

item.title: DataViz Makeover 3
item.dc:creator: Amos Lau
item.description: This post will be looking at an interactive data visualisation created to reveal the spatio-temporal patterns of armed conflict in selected South-east Asia countries between 2010-2020 and to identify possible areas of improvement.

item.title: Visual Analytics Project Proposal
item.dc:creator: Amos Lau
Cheryl Pay
Louis Chong
item.description: This post contains the proposal for our Visual Analytics Project titled VISTAS - Visualising Industry Skill TAlent Shifts.

item.title: DataViz Makeover 2
item.dc:creator: Amos Lau
item.description: This post will be looking at two data visualisations created by a research scientist of a research team conducting a study to understand the willingness of the public to take COVID-19 vaccinations.

item.title: DataViz Makeover 1
item.dc:creator: Amos Lau
item.description: This post will be looking at Chart 6 Resident labour force by age in MOM's Report: Labour Force in Singapore 2019 to see if there are possible areas of improvement and come up with a proposed visualisation to improve on those areas.

item.title: Welcome to Amos' Visual Analytics Blog
item.dc:creator: Amos Lau
item.description: Welcome to my blog. This blog was started for my masters module on Visual Analytics, and will be updated as and when I find other interesting things to write on.
